channel.title: Piper Sandler on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Piper Sandler on FinanClub

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:76 Chances: Rivian stock bounced today after one analyst thinks shares could double. Shares of Rivian (RIVN) were rising in early trading on Friday after analysts at Piper Sandler upgraded the stock to Overweight from Neutral. Piper Sandler analyst Alexander Potter upgraded Rivian shares to Buy from Hold.
